prompts: Create a forest-dwelling Pokemon that resembles a deer with branches for antlers.
Imagine a Pokemon that changes its appearance with the seasons, showcasing vibrant colors.
Show me a quadruped Pokemon that has a graceful stance and leafy decorations.
Design a Normal-type Pokemon that embodies the essence of nature with earthy tones.
Generate a Pokemon that is friendly and gentle, often found in grassy fields.
Make a Pokemon that can blend into its forest habitat, featuring brown and green hues.
Give me a Pokemon with a unique ability to heal other creatures in its vicinity.
